   22: 
   23: -module(ssl_handshake_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   26: 
   27: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   28: -include("ssl_alert.hrl").
   29: -include("ssl_handshake.hrl").
   30: -include("ssl_internal.hrl").
   31: -include("ssl_record.hrl").
   32: -include("tls_handshake.hrl").
   33: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   34: 
   35: %% Common test
   36: -export([all/0,
   37:          init_per_suite/1,
   38:          init_per_group/2,
   39:          init_per_testcase/2,
   40:          end_per_suite/1,
   41:          end_per_group/2,
   42:          end_per_testcase/2
   43:         ]).
   44: 
   45: %% Test cases
   46: -export([decode_hello_handshake/1,
   47:          decode_single_hello_extension_correctly/1,
   48:          decode_supported_elliptic_curves_hello_extension_correctly/1,
   49:          decode_unknown_hello_extension_correctly/1,
   50:          encode_single_hello_sni_extension_correctly/1,
   51:          decode_single_hello_sni_extension_correctly/1,
   52:          decode_empty_server_sni_correctly/1,
   53:          select_proper_tls_1_2_rsa_default_hashsign/1,
   54:          ignore_hassign_extension_pre_tls_1_2/1,
   55:          signature_algorithms/1]).
   56: 
   57: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   58: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   59: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   60: all() -> [decode_hello_handshake,
   61: 	  decode_single_hello_extension_correctly,
   62: 	  decode_supported_elliptic_curves_hello_extension_correctly,
   63: 	  decode_unknown_hello_extension_correctly,
   64: 	  encode_single_hello_sni_extension_correctly,
   65: 	  decode_single_hello_sni_extension_correctly,
   66: 	  decode_empty_server_sni_correctly,
   67: 	  select_proper_tls_1_2_rsa_default_hashsign,
   68: 	  ignore_hassign_extension_pre_tls_1_2,
   69: 	  signature_algorithms].
   70: 
   71: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   72: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   73:     Config.
   74: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   75:     Config.
   76: 
   77: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   78:     Config.
   79: 
   80: end_per_group(_,Config) ->
   81:     Config.
   82: 
   83: init_per_testcase(TC, Config0) when
   84:       TC =:= ignore_hassign_extension_pre_tls_1_2 orelse
   85:       TC =:= signature_algorithms ->
   86:     catch crypto:stop(),
   87:     try crypto:start() of
   88: 	ok ->
   89: 	    case is_supported(sha512) of
   90: 		true ->
   91: 		    ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
   92: 		    %% make rsa certs using oppenssl
   93: 		    {ok, _} = make_certs:all(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config0),
   94: 					     proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config0)),
   95: 		    Config = ssl_test_lib:cert_options(Config0),
   96: 		    ct:timetrap({seconds, 5}),
   97: 		    Config;
   98: 		false ->
   99: 		    {skip, "Crypto did not support sha512"}  
  100: 	    end
  101:     catch _:_ ->
  102: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  103:     end;
  104: init_per_testcase(_, Config0) ->
  105:     Config0.
  106: 
  107: end_per_testcase(ignore_hassign_extension_pre_tls_1_2, _) ->
  108:     crypto:stop();
  109: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  110:     Config.
  111: 
  112: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  113: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  114: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  115: decode_hello_handshake(_Config) ->
  116:     HelloPacket = <<16#02, 16#00, 16#00,
  117: 		    16#44, 16#03, 16#03, 16#4e, 16#7f, 16#c1, 16#03, 16#35,
  118: 		    16#c2, 16#07, 16#b9, 16#4a, 16#58, 16#af, 16#34, 16#07,
  119: 		    16#a6, 16#7e, 16#ef, 16#52, 16#cb, 16#e0, 16#ea, 16#b7,
  120: 		    16#aa, 16#47, 16#c8, 16#c2, 16#2c, 16#66, 16#fa, 16#f8,
  121: 		    16#09, 16#42, 16#cf, 16#00, 16#c0, 16#30, 16#00, 16#00,
  122: 		    16#1c,
  123: 		    16#00, 16#0b, 16#00, 16#04, 16#03, 16#00, 16#01, 16#02, % ec_point_formats
  124: 		    16#ff, 16#01, 16#00, 16#01, 16#00, %% renegotiate
  125: 		    16#00, 16#23,
  126: 		    16#00, 16#00, 16#33, 16#74, 16#00, 16#07, 16#06, 16#73,
  127: 		    16#70, 16#64, 16#79, 16#2f, 16#32>>,
  128: 	
  129:     Version = ?SSL_3_0,
  130:     DefOpts = ssl:update_options([{verify, verify_none}], client, #{}),
  131:     {Records, _Buffer} = tls_handshake:get_tls_handshakes(Version, HelloPacket, <<>>, DefOpts),
  132: 
  133:     {Hello, _Data} = hd(Records),
  134:     Extensions = Hello#server_hello.extensions,
  135:     #{renegotiation_info := #renegotiation_info{renegotiated_connection = <<0>>}} = Extensions.
  136: 
  137: decode_single_hello_extension_correctly(_Config) -> 
  138:     Renegotiation = <<?UINT16(?RENEGOTIATION_EXT), ?UINT16(1), 0>>,
  139:     Extensions = ssl_handshake:decode_extensions(Renegotiation, ?TLS_1_2, undefined),
  140:     #{renegotiation_info := #renegotiation_info{renegotiated_connection = <<0>>}} = Extensions.
  141: 
  142: decode_supported_elliptic_curves_hello_extension_correctly(_Config) ->
  143:     % List of supported and unsupported curves (RFC4492:S5.1.1)
  144:     ClientEllipticCurves = [0, tls_v1:oid_to_enum(?sect233k1), 37, tls_v1:oid_to_enum(?sect193r2), 16#badc],
  145:     % Construct extension binary - modified version of ssl_handshake:encode_hello_extensions([#elliptic_curves{}], _)
  146:     EllipticCurveList = << <<X:16>> || X <- ClientEllipticCurves>>,
  147:     ListLen = byte_size(EllipticCurveList),
  148:     Len = ListLen + 2,
  149:     Extension = <<?UINT16(?ELLIPTIC_CURVES_EXT), ?UINT16(Len), ?UINT16(ListLen), EllipticCurveList/binary>>,
  150:     % after decoding we should see only valid curves
  151:     Extensions = ssl_handshake:decode_hello_extensions(Extension, ?TLS_1_1, ?TLS_1_1, client),
  152:     #{elliptic_curves := #elliptic_curves{elliptic_curve_list = [?sect233k1, ?sect193r2]}} = Extensions. 
  153: 
  154: decode_unknown_hello_extension_correctly(_Config) ->
  155:     FourByteUnknown = <<16#CA,16#FE, ?UINT16(4), 3, 0, 1, 2>>,
  156:     Renegotiation = <<?UINT16(?RENEGOTIATION_EXT), ?UINT16(1), 0>>,
  157:     Extensions = ssl_handshake:decode_hello_extensions(<<FourByteUnknown/binary, Renegotiation/binary>>, ?TLS_1_1, ?TLS_1_1, client),
  158:     #{renegotiation_info := #renegotiation_info{renegotiated_connection = <<0>>}} = Extensions.
  159: 
  160: 
  161: encode_single_hello_sni_extension_correctly(_Config) ->
  162:     SNI = <<16#00, 16#00, 16#00, 16#0d, 16#00, 16#0b, 16#00, 16#00, 16#08,
  163: 	    $t,    $e,    $s,    $t,    $.,    $c,    $o,    $m>>,
  164:     ExtSize = byte_size(SNI),
  165:     HelloExt = <<ExtSize:16/unsigned-big-integer, SNI/binary>>,
  166:     Encoded = ssl_handshake:encode_extensions([#sni{hostname = "test.com"}]),
  167:     HelloExt = Encoded.
  168: 
  169: decode_single_hello_sni_extension_correctly(_Config) ->
  170:     SNI = <<16#00, 16#00, 16#00, 16#0d, 16#00, 16#0b, 16#00, 16#00, 16#08,
  171: 	    $t,    $e,    $s,    $t,    $.,    $c,    $o,    $m>>,
  172:     Decoded = ssl_handshake:decode_hello_extensions(SNI, ?TLS_1_2, ?TLS_1_2, client),
  173:     #{sni := #sni{hostname = "test.com"}} = Decoded.
  174: 
  175: decode_empty_server_sni_correctly(_Config) ->
  176:     SNI = <<?UINT16(?SNI_EXT),?UINT16(0)>>,
  177:     Decoded = ssl_handshake:decode_hello_extensions(SNI, ?TLS_1_2, ?TLS_1_2, server),
  178:     #{sni := #sni{hostname = ""}} = Decoded.
  179: 
  180: 
  181: select_proper_tls_1_2_rsa_default_hashsign(_Config) ->
  182:     % RFC 5246 section 7.4.1.4.1 tells to use {sha1,rsa} as default signature_algorithm for RSA key exchanges
  183:     {sha, rsa} = ssl_handshake:select_hashsign_algs(undefined, ?rsaEncryption, ?TLS_1_2),
  184:     % Older versions use MD5/SHA1 combination
  185:     {md5sha, rsa} = ssl_handshake:select_hashsign_algs(undefined, ?rsaEncryption, ?TLS_1_1),
  186:     {md5sha, rsa} = ssl_handshake:select_hashsign_algs(undefined, ?rsaEncryption, ?SSL_3_0).
  187: 
  188: 
  189: ignore_hassign_extension_pre_tls_1_2(Config) ->
  190:     Opts = proplists:get_value(server_opts, Config),
  191:     CertFile = proplists:get_value(certfile, Opts),
  192:     [{_, Cert, _}] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(CertFile),
  193:     HashSigns = #hash_sign_algos{hash_sign_algos = [{sha512, rsa}, {sha, dsa}, {sha256, rsa}]},
  194:     {sha512, rsa} = ssl_handshake:select_hashsign({HashSigns, undefined}, Cert, ecdhe_rsa, tls_v1:default_signature_algs([?TLS_1_2]), ?TLS_1_2),
  195:     %%% Ignore
  196:     {md5sha, rsa} = ssl_handshake:select_hashsign({HashSigns, undefined}, Cert, ecdhe_rsa, tls_v1:default_signature_algs([?TLS_1_1]), ?TLS_1_1),
  197:     {md5sha, rsa} = ssl_handshake:select_hashsign({HashSigns, undefined}, Cert, ecdhe_rsa, tls_v1:default_signature_algs([?SSL_3_0]), ?SSL_3_0).
  198: 
  199: signature_algorithms(Config) ->
  200:     Opts = proplists:get_value(server_opts, Config),
  201:     CertFile = proplists:get_value(certfile, Opts),
  202:     io:format("Cert = ~p~n", [CertFile]),
  203:     [{_, Cert, _}] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(CertFile),
  204:     HashSigns0 = #hash_sign_algos{
  205:                    hash_sign_algos = [{sha512, rsa},
  206:                                       {sha, dsa},
  207:                                       {sha256, rsa}]},
  208:     Schemes0 = #signature_algorithms_cert{
  209:                  signature_scheme_list = [rsa_pkcs1_sha256,
  210:                                           ecdsa_sha1]},
  211:     {sha512, rsa} = ssl_handshake:select_hashsign(
  212:                       {HashSigns0, undefined},
  213:                       Cert, ecdhe_rsa,
  214:                       tls_v1:default_signature_algs([?TLS_1_2]),
  215:                       ?TLS_1_2),
  216:     HashSigns1 = #hash_sign_algos{
  217:                     hash_sign_algos = [{sha, dsa},
  218:                                        {sha256, rsa}]},
  219:     {sha256, rsa} = ssl_handshake:select_hashsign(
  220:                       {HashSigns1, Schemes0},
  221:                       Cert, ecdhe_rsa,
  222:                       tls_v1:default_signature_algs([?TLS_1_2]),
  223:                       ?TLS_1_2),
  224:     Schemes1 = #signature_algorithms_cert{
  225:                   signature_scheme_list = [rsa_pkcs1_sha1,
  226:                                            ecdsa_sha1]},
  227:     %% Signature not supported
  228:     #alert{} = ssl_handshake:select_hashsign(
  229:                  {HashSigns1, Schemes1},
  230:                  Cert, ecdhe_rsa,
  231:                  tls_v1:default_signature_algs([?TLS_1_2]),
  232:                  ?TLS_1_2),
  233:     %% No scheme, hashsign is used
  234:     {sha256, rsa} = ssl_handshake:select_hashsign(
  235:                       {HashSigns1, undefined},
  236:                       Cert, ecdhe_rsa,
  237:                       tls_v1:default_signature_algs([?TLS_1_2]),
  238:                       ?TLS_1_2),
  239:     HashSigns2 = #hash_sign_algos{
  240:                     hash_sign_algos = [{sha, dsa}]},
  241:     %% Signature not supported
  242:     #alert{} = ssl_handshake:select_hashsign(
  243:                  {HashSigns2, Schemes1},
  244:                  Cert, ecdhe_rsa,
  245:                  tls_v1:default_signature_algs([?TLS_1_2]),
  246:                  ?TLS_1_2).
  247: 
  248: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  249: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
  250: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  251: 
  252: is_supported(Hash) ->
  253:     Algos = crypto:supports(),
  254:     Hashs = proplists:get_value(hashs, Algos), 
  255:     lists:member(Hash, Hashs).
